body_html:
There's no update in 1.7 release notes, so I believe you need to build it yourself in order to get CUDA 9.1 -- https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/releases/tag/v1.7.0-rc0

Switching to CUDA 9.1 in binary release will be kind of a pain for those of us using cloud, because it requires driver update

body:
There's no update in 1.7 release notes, so I believe you need to build it yourself in order to get CUDA 9.1 -- https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/releases/tag/v1.7.0-rc0

Switching to CUDA 9.1 in binary release will be kind of a pain for those of us using cloud, because it requires driver update
